snippet: While training with the United States basketball team that will be headed to the Rio Olympics, Anthony spoke about his activism against gun violence....
abstract: New York Knicks star Carmelo Anthony says he has received favorable response to his call for unity on social media in wake of fatal police shootings of black men and attacks on police in Dallas; Anthony, who is preparing for Olympic Games in Brazil, has shown growing interest in social activism and has called on fellow stars to use their influence to bring about change.
lead_paragraph: While training with the United States basketball team that will be headed to the Rio Olympics, Anthony spoke about his activism against gun violence.

headline.main: Carmelo Anthony Is Using His Voice and Olympic Platform for Social Change
headline.print_headline: Using His Voice to Promote Action
